Description: On ALT VA-220 North in the County of Botetourt, in the vicinity of Lee Hwy; US-11N/S; US-220N, US-11N/S, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. Lane closures exist.

Description: On I-66 at mile marker 67.6 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The west right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle
